fw.name: CATSchPlatformModeler
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATSchEventServices
class.abstract: Tools to manage events in the schematic platform.

method.name: ConnectToCntr
method.abstract: Connect this object to the graphic representations of all its connectors for visualization events.

method.name: ConnectToGRR
method.abstract: Connect this object to its graphic representation for visualization events.

method.name: ModifyConnectToCntr
method.abstract: Send a modify event to the connectors of the input object.

method.name: RedrawGraphViewerFromRoot
method.abstract: Refresh the specification tree from the input object.

method.name: RestoreAllEventConnections
method.abstract: Given a document, reconnect all the schematic objects in the schematic extension container and related drafting objects in the drafting container to their graphical representations for visualization events.

method.name: SendCreateEvent
method.abstract: Send a create event for an object that has been modified.

method.name: SendDeleteEvent
method.abstract: Send a delete event for an object that has been deleted.

method.name: SendEventByComponentGroup
method.abstract: Send an event to a component group object.

method.name: SendModifyEvent
method.abstract: Send a modify event for an object that has been modified.

method.name: SendModifyEventToAllCntrs
method.abstract: Send a modify event for all the connectors in the current document.
